name: dockman
description: Dockman is a lightweight TUI and CLI tool for managing Docker containers and images. It offers a curses-based interface for viewing logs, stats, and executing commands without a web UI.
features: Terminal UI: Curses-based interface for Docker management. No web browser needed.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Perfect for SSH sessions.
Log Access: View container logs in terminal. Quick troubleshooting.
Stats Display: Monitor resource usage in real-time. Performance visibility.
Command Execution: Run commands in containers directly. Full control from terminal.
CLI-Friendly: Perfect for terminal enthusiasts. Keyboard-driven workflow.
